Experience

Internship at Construções JJR Moçambique, S.A.

As an opportunity to get to know a new work and cultural environment I went to one of the affiliated companies of the one I had worked before. As a part of the internship I visited many working sites and registered the day-to-day in order to create weekly balances of the construction process.

Summer 2017

Internship at Construções JJR, S.A.

As part of a one-month internship, I had the unique opportunity to work in a variety of departments which allowed me to gather knowledge from different areas such as Management, Human Resources and Technical Support.

Summer 2016

Projects

Architecture Exhibition in Reservatório da Mãe D’Água

Member of the organization team and leader of the sponsorship branch. Worked with colleagues to arrange and present an archictecture exhibition of our fourth year projects. The result can be seen at Invisita.

June - July 2017

Published Book “Revit para Estudantes de Arquitectura”

Collaborator in a book related to BIM tools in architecture. Helped in the creation of the template for the book and wrote some of the chapters.

2014 - 2017

Miniclip Game Jam

Our group was awarded the 2nd place Overall and 1st place in Innovation. I was the main designer of all the objects and menus of the game. Worked with a team to develop a themed game in 48 hours.

Summer 2016
